      • lookupProduct

        public static Product lookupProduct​(int productId)
        Searches list of products by ID.
        Parameters:
        productId - the product ID.
        Returns:
        product object if found, null if not. Had an run-time error in this section "A Non-static method cannot be referenced from a static context". Fixed it by adding the alerts (Product was not found.) directly on the MainScreen.java instead using a switch statement.
